items.content_html: `sact.js` is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a simple API for creating components and managing state, similar to React. It includes basic hooks like `useState`, `useRef`, and `useEffect`, as well as routing utilities like `Router`, `addRoute`, and `renderWithRouter`.
items.title: sprdgx/SPACT: `sact.js` is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a simple API for creating components and managing state, similar to React. It includes basic hooks like `useState`, `useRef`, and `useEffect`, as well as routing utilities like `Router`, `addRoute`, and `renderWithRouter`.
